articles.title: Asia's top universities: NUS slips to 2nd place, NTU ranks 5th - The Straits Times
articles.description:
China’s Peking University takes the top spot from NUS, which was No. 1 for four years. NTU was ranked third last year.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - The National University of Singapore (NUS) came in second in an annual ranking of institutions in the region, losing its place as Asias No. 1 university over the past four years.

articles.title: ‘Blood moon’ total lunar eclipse to arrive on Tuesday - The Guardian
articles.description: Total eclipse to be visible in North America, Asia and the Pacific, but Africa, Middle East and Europe will have to wait until 2025
articles.content:
